profile-about-1: Vuvuzetla allows you to send messages that can only be read by people near you.
profile-about-2: Created by jojoc4, Deltora and Dr Suce
message-distance-text: The nearest message is at %s km
error-permission: Please enable location for this app
error-network: Error while connecting to server, please wait
error-msg: Your message cannot be sent, please retry
error-react-own: You cannot react to your own messages
